results.title: N-ACETYLCYSTEINE AND/OR URSODEOXYCHOLIC ACID ASSOCIATED WITH METFORMIN IN NON-ALCOHOLIC STEATOHEPATITIS: AN OPEN-LABEL MULTICENTER RANDOMIZED CONTROLLED TRIAL.

results.title: Metformin-stimulated mannose transport in dermal fibroblasts.
results.text_hl: MSMT was significant because in the presence of 2.5 microm @CHEMICAL_Mannose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008358 @@@mannose@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ corrected experimentally induced deficiencies in the synthesis of glucose(3)mannose(9)GlcNAc(2)-P-P-dolichol and @<m>DISEASE_N_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536108 @@@N-linked glycosylation@@@.

results.title: Metformin enhances the response to radiotherapy in diabetic patients with rectal cancer.
results.text_hl: On multivariate analysis, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use was associated with increased rates of @<m>DISEASE_N_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536108 @@@N@@@ downstaging and TRG 3-4 (p = 0.003 and p = 0.019, respectively).

results.title: Metformin Inhibits the NLRP3 Inflammasome via AMPK/mTOR-dependent Effects in Diabetic Cardiomyopathy
results.text_hl: We also detected the expression level of GSDMD-N, a key enzyme in the process of pyroptosis, using immunofluorescence staining and western blotting. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited the expression of @<m>DISEASE_N_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536108 @@@GSDMD-N@@@ (Fig. 3D and E).
